title: Consumed
description: Kim is an animal communicator, on her way to help her friend, at his animal rescue in Tennessee. Once at the farm she meets two brothers, Andrew and Robert. She soon discovers when either of the brothers touches her skin, it sparks something within her.  Soon she begins to fear that everyone on the farm is keeping secrets from her. She wants to run but her heart has other ideas, as does the brother she scorns. While she struggles with her dilemma, she soon discovers that she can hear the thoughts of one of the brothers.  Kim ignores all the obvious warning signs. Her instincts are telling her to run like hell, her heart says stay. She doesnâ€™t want to admit to herself, what she believes they actually are. When her suspicions are revealed, Kim flees out of fear, knowing that everyone she has trusted, has betrayed her.
author: Kellie Zottman
